thread.section_title: Triple Crown Products Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Triple Crown Products | triplecrownproducts.com
thread.title: Will
thread.title_full: Triple Crown Products reviewed by Will

author: Will
title: Will
text:
Everyone from Triple Crown has been very easy to work with and the product selection and quality is great. The custom embroidery is flawless. Improvement in proper sizing is needed. Some sizes measured for individuals that indicated they should order XL really needed size Large (torso too large and sleeves too long).
That being said, we will continue to order our products from Triple Crown now that we know to adjust for sizing.
